author: Sophie Lewis
title: More than 1,000 people in the U.S. died of coronavirus in one day
description: Wednesday marked the first time the U.S. reported more than 1,000 deaths from the virus in a single day, according to data from Johns Hopkins University.
content:
More than 1,000 people in the U.S. died from coronavirus in a 24-hour period, making Wednesday the deadliest day for the pandemic in America so far.
